statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: The country of jiuye composed by N cites. Each city can be viewed as a point in a two- dimensional plane with integer coordinates (x,y). The distance between city i and city j is defined by d<sub>ij</sub> = |x<sub>i</sub> - x<sub>j</sub>| + |y<sub>i</sub> - y<sub>j</sub>|. jiuye want to setup airport in K cities among N cities. So he need your help to choose these K cities, to minimize the maximum distance to the nearest airport of each city. That is , if we define d<sub>i</sub>(1 ≤ i ≤ N ) as the distance from city i to the nearest city with airport. Your aim is to minimize the value max{d<sub>i</sub>|1 ≤ i ≤ N }. You just output the minimum.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line of the input is T (1 ≤ T ≤ 100), which stands for the number of test cases you need to solve.

The first line of each case contains two integers N ,K (1 ≤ N ≤ 60,1 ≤ K ≤ N ),as mentioned above.

The next N lines, each lines contains two integer xi and yi (-109 ≤ xi, yi ≤ 109), denote the coordinates of city i.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, print a line “Case #t: ”(without quotes, t means the index of the test case) at the beginning. Then a single integer means the minimum.
